timeline.message: added exam table multi correction column and first changes to direct Exam components
added exam table multi correction column and first changes to direct Exam components

timeline.bodyText:
Please avoid the ! operator. We never know if latestResult has a proper value.
Instead use the ? operator so that it can fail.
Also avoid null and rather use undefined checks (I know this was here before, but we should change it)
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@

{{ submission.submissionDate | date: 'MMM d, y HH:mm:ss' }} {{ submission.participation.submissions?.length }} - {{ getLatestSubmissionResult(submission)!.score }}% + {{ submission.latestResult!.score }}%

timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: refresh sounds like retrieving it from the server, also make sure to add JavaDoc style documentation
replies.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: another thing: I would also offer this for one submission, then you don't need to wrap submissions in array when calling this method. As there is no overloading for Typescript functions, you need to use two different names
replies.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: why do we need it twice?
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText:
During testing we discoverd that after this.prepareTextBlocksAndFeedbackFor() we need to refresh. Insiede of this.setConflictingSubmission(0); this.prepareTextBlocksAndFeedbackFor() is called again.
Since we have indiviudal refrehs now we can find out which are really necessary. I'll check it
replies.author: SimonEntholzer

replies.bodyText: Turns out we don't need it after all, it was only necessary when we still had the map for some reason. I removed the unused updates
replies.author: SimonEntholzer

timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: I missed that one, I removed the funciton and its calls.

timeline.author: nicolasruscher

timeline.bodyText:
Quick Note, the method setLatestSubmissionResult isn't actually used in the code right now, at the moment we just do submission.latestResult = getlatestSubmissionResult(submission);
-> I think we have two option: remove the function, or rewrite the calls of
submission.latestResult = getlatestSubmissionResult(submission); to
setLatestSubmissionResult(submission, getLatestSubmissionResult(submission))
timeline.author: nicolasruscher
